[vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”45″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”5″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”100″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”0″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ style=”inherited”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” mobile_width=”0″ width=”4/12″][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”2″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ zoom_width=”0″ zoom_height=”0″ width=”8/12″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-175345″ text_size=”h1″ text_weight=”400″ text_space=”fontspace-111509″ sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” text_align=”text-left” text_serif=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”149371″]We focus on quality, and excellent ‘design service’, as being the

cornerstone of our practice.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”100″ back_color=”color-wayh” back_image=”82024″ back_attachment=”fixed” back_position=”center top” parallax=”yes” overlay_color=”color-nhtu” overlay_alpha=”15″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ top_divider=”gradient” uncode_shortcode_id=”213956″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette” back_size=”contain” overlay_color_type=”uncode-palette”][vc_column column_width_use_pixel=”yes” position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ style=”dark” overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ column_width_pixel=”1100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”141607″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”7″ bottom_padding=”7″ back_color=”color-590268″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ uncode_shortcode_id=”656760″ back_color_type=”uncode-palette”][vc_column column_width_use_pixel=”yes” position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ style=”light” overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″ column_width_pixel=”1000″ uncode_shortcode_id=”111844″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-prif” heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-136269″ text_size=”h1″ text_weight=”400″ text_transform=”uppercase” uncode_shortcode_id=”148289″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]About the firm[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”725773″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

ZZ Architects is a multidisciplinary and multi award winning design firm led by Principal Architects Krupa Zubin and Zubin Zainuddin. ZZ Architects is considered to be among the leading Architectural and Interior Design Firms of India. Creative and Technical minds are grouped in teams that follow projects all the way through from concept to completion. Each team comprises of Team Leaders and Team Members with expertise in various aspects like Project Management, FF&E, CAD, Visualization, Design Development and Market research. A team of 80 plus architects and designers strive constantly to create projects that stand out because of the distinct approach towards design, detail and the latest technology. Intensive Research is critical for the team, to be relevant in an ever-evolving global design market.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”110640″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

ZZ Architects is known for their unique approach, to architecture and interior design, which is a bespoke and very intimate process of discovering and delivering as per each client’s personal style. Over the past couple of decades, ZZ Architects has emerged as a leading full-service Luxury Architecture, Interior Design and Décor firm based in Mumbai and have been working across key cities in the country with clients including leaders in business, finance and industry, as well as society, film and politics. The firm’s work encompasses projects across categories with work and clients spread all around leading cities in India and also select cities globally.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”820474″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

KZ & ZZ are personally involved in every project personally with the client throughout the stage of the project from inception. The studio has a dedicated Material Research Library spread over 2500 square feet, which is the heart of studio where innovation, research and discovery is encouraged to come up with schemes which are truly inspirational.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”188631″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

ZZ Architects works with highly qualified and selective suppliers and contractors to ensure the best quality, fit and finish for all projects.
ZZ Architects is currently working on projects across various categories in over 20 key cities in the country, and a few select international cities as well.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
